name: Guard Duty - Official Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The official Guard Duty soundtrack, composed by Richard S. Featuring 37 tracks from the game and compatible with Steam Music Player.

Music is provided in .MP3 format - 192kbps.

Track list:

  • 2074 - Duration: 02:04
  • A Rude Awakening - Duration: 00:52
  • Adventure Begins - Duration: 01:00
  • Arrival - Duration: 01:04
  • Before The Storm - Duration: 00:40
  • Beyond The Scar - Duration: 00:58
  • Castle Wrinklewood Harp - Duration: 00:56
  • Castle Wrinklewood - Duration: 00:56
  • Confrontation - Duration: 01:44
  • Deadwoods - Duration: 02:37
  • Detention - Duration: 01:07
  • Dizzy - Duration: 01:00
  • Drunken Monk - Duration: 01:20
  • Enchanted Forest - Duration: 00:58
  • Endgame - Duration: 01:07
  • Feast - Duration: 02:34
  • Freefall - Duration: 01:04
  • Guard Duty Piano - Duration: 01:36
  • Guard Duty - Duration: 01:00
  • Harvest - Duration: 04:16
  • Kidnapping - Duration: 01:00
  • Lazy - Duration: 01:05
  • Loss - Duration: 00:52
  • Lost In Time - Duration: 01:00
  • Lover's Walk - Duration: 00:58
  • Paddy Fields - Duration: 02:17
  • Promotion - Duration: 01:06
  • Red Alert - Duration: 01:59
  • Sacrifice - Duration: 01:05
  • Saviour - Duration: 00:58
  • Snowfields - Duration: 00:58
  • Stranger - Duration: 00:43
  • Tomb - Duration: 01:00
  • Town Gates - Duration: 01:16
  • Town Square - Duration: 01:42
  • Wildlands - Duration: 01:13
  • Wrinklewood - Duration: 00:58

After purchasing the soundtrack the files will be downloaded to your Guard Duty installation folder, in a sub-folder called 'Guard Duty Soundtrack'.

short_description: The official Guard Duty soundtrack, composed by Richard S. Featuring 37 tracks from the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Graphics: 320x240, 32-bit color, 700 Mhz
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Graphics: 640x480, 32-bit color, 1200 Mhz
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: Video Card with 256MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Digital Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: Video Card with 256MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Digital Sound Card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 9.x, Ubuntu 16.x, SteamOS
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires an OpenGL 2.x compliant 3D card
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Digital Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 9.x, Ubuntu 16.x, SteamOS
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires an OpenGL 2.x compliant 3D card
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Digital Sound Card
